thread.title: Samsung cuts price for latest virtual reality headset to $99 - SiliconValley.com
thread.title_full: Samsung cuts price for latest virtual reality headset to $99 - SiliconValley.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: SiliconValley.com
title: Samsung cuts price for latest virtual reality headset to $99 - SiliconValley.com
text:
Samsung says a new virtual reality headset will be 22 percent lighter and, at $99, half the price of its previous model. The Korean electronics company hopes the changes to the Gear VR, which ships in November, will help push virtual reality into the mainstream.
 SiliconValley.com.
